structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXXIV. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY CITIZENS' TRANSPORTATION OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE

law.catch_line: Creation of Miami-Dade County Citizens' Transportation Oversight Committee.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1161. Creation of Miami-Dade County Citizens' Transportation Oversight Committee.
There is hereby created an advisory and oversight committee to be known as the Miami-Dade County Citizens' Transportation Oversight Committee ("Oversight Committee").
